segments.text: Where did you get assigned to go this time around ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They asked me to go to Paris to check on the new office that was just established there . And you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Hong Kong again . I would like to go somewhere different for a change .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Teach me Cantonese and I'll pull some strings to get a trade with you next time around .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If you really want to learn , remind me when you get back from your business trip .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm scheduled to fly out on the tenth .
segments.speaker: S2
